titleStmt.title: An exposition vpon the first chapter of the second Epistle of Peter with, the principall doctrines naturally arising from euery verse of the same chapter. By Stephen Denison minister of Kree-Church London.
titleStmt.author: Denison, Stephen, d. 1649 or 50.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Field for Robert Mylbourne, and are to be sold at the great south doore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the great south doore of Pauls
